languages.text: {n}Идира снова фокусируется на вас. Ее усмешка меркнет, а взгляд становится мягче.{/n} "Знаете... когда со мной произошло... ну, вы помните... я думала, что с катушек съеду от ужаса. Но теперь, зная, что вы за меня — у меня как будто этот проклятый шепот в голове тише стал. Легче не думать о плохом".

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира снова фокусируется на вас. Ее усмешка меркнет, а взгляд становится мягче.{/n} "Знаете... когда со мной произошло... ну, вы помните... я думала, что с катушек съеду от ужаса. Но теперь, зная, что вы за меня — у меня как будто этот проклятый шепот в голове тише стал. Легче не думать о плохом".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira's eyes focus on you again. Her smile fades and her expression softens.{/n} "You know... what happened to me... well, you remember... I thought I'd go crazy with fear. But now that I know you've got my back, it's like that cursed whispering in my head has grown quieter. It's easier not to think about the worst that could happen."

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉的目光再次聚焦在你身上。她的笑容渐渐褪去，表情也变得缓和下来。{/n}“你也知道……我发生了什么事情……是啊，你也记得吧……我当时还以为自己会在恐惧中发疯。但如今，我知道你一直在支持我，我脑中那个被诅咒的低语声也变得更安静了。只要不必再去想最糟糕的结果，一切都会变得轻松下来。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's eyes focus on you again. Her smile fades and her expression softens.{/n} "You know... what happened to me... well, you remember... I thought I'd go crazy with fear. But now that I know you've got my back, it's like that cursed whispering in my head has grown quieter. It's easier not to think about the worst that could happen."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉的目光再次聚焦在你身上。她的笑容渐渐褪去，表情也变得缓和下来。{/n}“你也知道……我发生了什么事情……是啊，你也记得吧……我当时还以为自己会在恐惧中发疯。但如今，我知道你一直在支持我，我脑中那个被诅咒的低语声也变得更安静了。只要不必再去想最糟糕的结果，一切都会变得轻松下来。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Idira's eyes focus on you again. Her smile fades and her expression softens.{/n} "You know... what happened to me... well, you remember... I thought I'd go crazy with fear. But now that I know you've got my back, it's like that cursed whispering in my head has grown quieter. It's easier not to think about the worst that could happen."

languages.text: {n}Los ojos de Idira vuelven a centrarse en ti. Su sonrisa se desvanece y su expresión se suaviza.{/n} «¿Sabe?... Cuando pasó... bueno, lo que pasó... pensé que me volvería loca del miedo. Pero, ahora que sé que cuento con su apoyo, es como si esos malditos susurros de mi cabeza se hubieran acallado. Me resulta más fácil no ponerme en la peor situación posible».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's eyes focus on you again. Her smile fades and her expression softens.{/n} "You know... what happened to me... well, you remember... I thought I'd go crazy with fear. But now that I know you've got my back, it's like that cursed whispering in my head has grown quieter. It's easier not to think about the worst that could happen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos de Idira vuelven a centrarse en ti. Su sonrisa se desvanece y su expresión se suaviza.{/n} «¿Sabe?... Cuando pasó... bueno, lo que pasó... pensé que me volvería loca del miedo. Pero, ahora que sé que cuento con su apoyo, es como si esos malditos susurros de mi cabeza se hubieran acallado. Me resulta más fácil no ponerme en la peor situación posible».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラの視線が再びあなたに注がれる。笑顔が消え、表情が和らぐ。{/n}「あのさ…あたいの身に起こったこと…覚えてるわよね。あたいが恐怖で気が狂うかと思ったわ。でも、今は陛下があたいの背中を守ってくれているってわかったから、頭の中の呪いの囁きが小さくなったみたい。起こりうる最悪の事態を考えないほうが楽なのよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's eyes focus on you again. Her smile fades and her expression softens.{/n} "You know... what happened to me... well, you remember... I thought I'd go crazy with fear. But now that I know you've got my back, it's like that cursed whispering in my head has grown quieter. It's easier not to think about the worst that could happen."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラの視線が再びあなたに注がれる。笑顔が消え、表情が和らぐ。{/n}「あのさ…あたいの身に起こったこと…覚えてるわよね。あたいが恐怖で気が狂うかと思ったわ。でも、今は陛下があたいの背中を守ってくれているってわかったから、頭の中の呪いの囁きが小さくなったみたい。起こりうる最悪の事態を考えないほうが楽なのよ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idiras Augen konzentrieren sich wieder auf dich. Ihr Lächeln schwindet und ihr Gesichtsausdruck wird weicher.{/n} "Wisst Ihr ... was mir geschehen ist ... Nun, Ihr erinnert Euch ja ... Ich dachte, ich würde vor Angst den Verstand verlieren. Doch nun, da ich weiß, dass Ihr mich unterstützt, ist dieses verfluchte Flüstern in meinem Kopf etwas leiser geworden. Es ist leichter, nicht darüber nachzudenken, was schlimmstenfalls geschehen könnte."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's eyes focus on you again. Her smile fades and her expression softens.{/n} "You know... what happened to me... well, you remember... I thought I'd go crazy with fear. But now that I know you've got my back, it's like that cursed whispering in my head has grown quieter. It's easier not to think about the worst that could happen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idiras Augen konzentrieren sich wieder auf dich. Ihr Lächeln schwindet und ihr Gesichtsausdruck wird weicher.{/n} "Wisst Ihr ... was mir geschehen ist ... Nun, Ihr erinnert Euch ja ... Ich dachte, ich würde vor Angst den Verstand verlieren. Doch nun, da ich weiß, dass Ihr mich unterstützt, ist dieses verfluchte Flüstern in meinem Kopf etwas leiser geworden. Es ist leichter, nicht darüber nachzudenken, was schlimmstenfalls geschehen könnte."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les yeux d'Idira se fixent de nouveau sur vous alors que son sourire s'efface pour laisser place à une expression plus douce.{/n} « Vous savez... ce qui m'est arrivé... Vous vous en souvenez... J'ai cru que la peur allait me rendre folle, mais maintenant que je sais que je peux compter sur vous, c'est comme si ces maudits murmures s'étaient calmés. Après, ça reste plus simple d'éviter de penser au pire. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's eyes focus on you again. Her smile fades and her expression softens.{/n} "You know... what happened to me... well, you remember... I thought I'd go crazy with fear. But now that I know you've got my back, it's like that cursed whispering in my head has grown quieter. It's easier not to think about the worst that could happen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux d'Idira se fixent de nouveau sur vous alors que son sourire s'efface pour laisser place à une expression plus douce.{/n} « Vous savez... ce qui m'est arrivé... Vous vous en souvenez... J'ai cru que la peur allait me rendre folle, mais maintenant que je sais que je peux compter sur vous, c'est comme si ces maudits murmures s'étaient calmés. Après, ça reste plus simple d'éviter de penser au pire. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira'nın gözleri yeniden sana odaklanıyor. Gülümsemesinin kaybolmasıyla birlikte ifadesi yumuşuyor.{/n} "Biliyorsun... Başıma gelenler... Hani hatırlarsın... Korkudan delireceğimi sanmıştım. Ama şimdi arkamı kolladığını biliyorum ya, kafamın içindeki lanetli fısıltıların sesi biraz kesildi gibi. Olabilecek en kötü senaryoyu düşünmemek şimdi daha kolay."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's eyes focus on you again. Her smile fades and her expression softens.{/n} "You know... what happened to me... well, you remember... I thought I'd go crazy with fear. But now that I know you've got my back, it's like that cursed whispering in my head has grown quieter. It's easier not to think about the worst that could happen."

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira'nın gözleri, yeniden sana odaklanıyor. Gülümsemesinin kaybolmasıyla birlikte ifadesi yumuşuyor.{/n} "Bilirsin ya... Başıma gelenler... Hani hatırlarsın... Korkudan deliye döneceğimi sanmıştım. Ama şimdi arkamı kolladığını biliyorum ya, sanki kafamın içindeki lanetli fısıltıların sesi biraz kesilmiş gibi. Olabilecek en kötü senaryoyu düşünmemek şimdi daha kolay."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
